participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, he enjoys outdoor activities and loves challenges.
participant_1.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado. i have a black lab named trooper. i'm a mechanical engineer. my favorite activity is rock climbing.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Resilient and motivational, she inspires others with her journey and dedication to fitness.
participant_2.background: i'm a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater. i love running and preparing for marathons.
